==Availability==
==Availability==
â
The phone is expected to be sold SIM-unlocked<ref>http://www.slashgear.com/galaxy-nexus-gets-priced-sim-free-19189361/</ref> and hardware-unlocked (unlocked bootloader, allowing root access).<ref>http://www.engadget.com/2011/10/24/motorola-razr-open-for-unlocked-bootloader-business-if-the-carr/</ref>
+
The phone is expected to be sold [[SIM lock|SIM-unlocked]]<ref>http://www.slashgear.com/galaxy-nexus-gets-priced-sim-free-19189361/</ref> and hardware-unlocked (unlocked bootloader, allowing [[Rooting (Android OS)|root access]]).<ref>http://www.engadget.com/2011/10/24/motorola-razr-open-for-unlocked-bootloader-business-if-the-carr/</ref>
The phone will be supported by the carrier [[NTT DoCoMo]] in Japan, where the variant sold there will be officially known as the [[:ja:SC-04D|SC-04D]] within the [[:ja:docomo NEXT series|docomo NEXT series]] of smartphone devices.
The phone will be supported by the carrier [[NTT DoCoMo]] in Japan, where the variant sold there will be officially known as the [[:ja:SC-04D|SC-04D]] within the [[:ja:docomo NEXT series|docomo NEXT series]] of smartphone devices.
